moves.name: Snarl
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Sp. Atk. by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Dire Hit All +
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

passives.name: Emergency Barrier
passives.description: Applies the Physical Damage Reduction effect to the allied field of play the first time the user is in a pinch each battle.
